column4: I sent a letter today to @WHOSTP to demand answers on its failure to uphold scientific integrity and call for immediate action to ensure these standards are protected to prevent further deadly harm to our nation from #COVID19. https://t.co/STQdRTmMmr

The Trump Administration is claiming ‚Äúmission accomplished‚Äù on a pandemic that has killed nearly a quarter of a million Americans, infected more than 8.6 million and caused millions more to fall into poverty. https://t.co/3Oc1wEOdBr

My latest newsletter shows how our $2 trillion CARES Act passed in March delivered vital support to the American people. With #COVID19 cases again on the rise, it's more clear than ever that we need another rescue for families, workers & small businesses.

https://t.co/dexsRFjm4A

#COVID19 cases across the nation are once again on the rise. 

Rather than acting immediately to support American families in the midst of this crisis, the Senate continues to drag its feet. 

Our communities need a rescue. We need the #HeroesAct.

Dismantling the #CleanWaterAct threatens the health of Americans‚Äîparticularly low-income & communities of color‚Äîin the middle of a public health crisis. We can't let this Administration undo 48 years of progress. We must fight to #ProtectCleanWater. #CWA48
https://t.co/LNRXNfAcA3

This week marks the 48th anniversary of the Clean Water Act. Now more than ever we need to work to protect the safety of our water systems and health of all families. I will not stop fighting in Congress to #ProtectCleanWater. #CWA48

3 weeks ago, the House passed the updated #HeroesAct to help Americans get back on their feet by:

- Funding testing, tracing & treatment
- Sending another round of stimulus checks
- Restoring $600/week expanded unemployment

It's past time the Senate pass this #COVID19 rescue.

#COVID19 has impacted communities of color at an alarming rate and shown the clear inequities of our public health system, and now @EPA is gutting regulations that are meant to #ProtectCleanWater and keep families healthy. These dangerous cuts must end. #CWA48

We know that our health is deeply tied to our access to clean water, yet the Trump Administration has attacked the #CleanWaterAct at every step. We must fight back these attacks so that every community has access to safe, clean water. #CWA48 #ProtectCleanWater

For 48 years, the #CleanWaterAct has protected communities from coast to coast. But the fight to #ProtectCleanWater is far from over. 

#CWA48 reminds us how far we've come to protect public health & how much more must be done to ensure every American has access to clean water.

With each passing week that the Senate fails to advance a #COVID19 rescue, more Americans are forced to file for unemployment. I urge Senate Republicans to at last come to the negotiating table to pass a plan that truly delivers for those who need it most.
https://t.co/hdoVguEpMn

This is simple. Americans are getting sick & dying. Businesses are closing. People need help. No more obstruction and partisan games.

The Senate must vote right now to pass the House compromise rescue or propose a REAL alternative.

Millions of Americans have fallen into poverty through no fault of their own. 

The House passed multiple #COVID19 rescue plans. Meanwhile, Republicans are racing to confirm Trump‚Äôs Supreme Court nominee. The Senate has a duty to serve, not play politics.

https://t.co/eW6DmlDF19

The House passed our updated #HeroesAct to: 

üßëüèΩ‚Äç‚öï‚Äç Honor our heroes 
üè• Support testing, tracing & treatment
üèòÔ∏è Strengthen housing assistance & food security
üó≥Ô∏è Safeguard our democracy 

The Senate continues to delay this vital rescue for the American people.
The pandemic as well as attempts to scare certain communities has made an accurate count more difficult.

This ruling undermines this Constitutional duty, guarantees an inaccurate reflection of our nation‚Äôs composition and denies our communities their fair share of federal funding for health care, education, infrastructure and many more vital services for the next ten years.

While the Senate has walked away from delivering needed relief for the American people, I have not stopped fighting alongside my colleagues to advance a #COVID19 rescue. Countless families, workers & businesses depend on federal support to weather this storm. We must not fail.

Today is #WorldMentalHealthDay. If you are struggling right now, know that you are not alone. Help is available. Text NAMI to 741741 and the @CrisisTextLine will respond with free mental health support, 24/7. #MIAW

Had the pleasure of speaking with my friends from @CapRegionBOCES today. As always, they imparted helpful insights, including how schools across our region have adjusted operations in the wake of #COVID19 and the serious need for federal funding for education. https://t.co/XfrCb6p7G8

There is no health without mental health. Join me in honoring this #MentalIllnessAwarenessWeek by providing compassion & support to those who need it.

If you're feeling overwhelmingly sad, anxious or stressed, know that you are not alone. We stand with you, now and always. #MIAW https://t.co/F5u4Yma2a2

The updated #HeroesAct makes critical additions to address needs that have arisen since the House first acted & maintains key priorities from our original bill.
  
The House has taken action‚Äînow the Senate must at long last advance a COVID-19 rescue for the American people.

Efficiency employs more Americans than any other single energy sector, but more than 400,000 jobs have been lost in this field due to the #COVID19 crisis. We need to make smart investments in #EnergyEfficiency to save money, cut pollution & create jobs! #EEDay2020

The House has passed two versions of the #HeroesAct to deliver urgently-needed #COVID19 rescue. Republicans must stop playing politics & enact the updated Heroes Act immediately or come forth with their own plan that delivers for American families.

Our updated #HeroesAct delivers for the American people with assistance for frontline heroes, funding for testing, tracing & treatment, support for our elections and much more. Read more about our vital rescue plan in my latest newsletter hereüëá
https://t.co/HlvQJLmZDo

House Democrats have passed more than 340 bipartisan bills #ForThePeople that are stuck in the Senate‚Äîbills to lower health care costs, raise wages by rebuilding America, and clean up corruption & strengthen our democracy‚Äîall sitting on @senatemajldr McConnell‚Äôs desk. https://t.co/PUvYvNeVQk

Our updated #HeroesAct makes good on @HouseDemocrats‚Äô push to compromise to address the health & economic crisis gripping our nation. After months of delay, the Senate must meet us at the negotiating table at long last & pass a bill that rescues families, workers & businesses.

The past several months have shown how crucial our manufacturers are in addressing the #COVID19 pandemic and helping strengthen our economy. Thank you to the makers of PPE, medical equipment, and everyone with homemade masks! üëè#MFGDay20

I‚Äôm troubled by news this morning that the President & First Lady have tested positive for COVID-19‚Äîa stark reminder of how easily this virus can be spread. I‚Äôm keeping them and all who are struggling with this disease in my thoughts and hope they make a swift & complete recovery

Our updated COVID-19 rescue delivers:

$225B in education funding
$436B in state & local assistance
$75B for COVID-19 testing & tracing
$15B in funding for @USPS
& much more

It's long past time the Senate work with @HouseDemocrats to provide the support Americans need.

575 days ago, the House took a historic step forward to advance #HR8, the Bipartisan Background Checks Act to help put an end to gun violence & protect our communities. Today we #WearOrangeMasks to keep the pressure on the Senate to finally vote on this life-saving legislation. https://t.co/CYof7HatZi

In the four months since the House passed the Heroes Act, more than 110,000 Americans have died of COVID-19.

This is the equivalent of losing every soul living in Albany, New York. We have reached the breaking point, plain and simple.

Let‚Äôs save lives and turn the corner on this crisis with a coordinated national plan for testing and tracing. 

The Heroes Act gets it done.

We have a plan. Join us.

Let‚Äôs invest heavily in research and follow science and public health guidance. They are the fastest route to get us to the other side of this crisis.

Our Heroes Act gets it done.

We‚Äôve been fighting for months to advance a COVID-19 rescue for our Capital Region & beyond. Senate Republicans won‚Äôt take up our bill and they won‚Äôt offer an alternative that is up to the job.

Now, our nation has passed the terrifying milestone of 200,000 deaths.

https://t.co/bwmKGJdCoQ

Wishing everyone celebrating at sundown in our Capital Region and beyond a healthy & happy new year! As I reflect on the past year, I'm thankful for the strength & courage so many in our community have shown. Together, we can do anything. Have a happy #RoshHashanah! https://t.co/Eyyv9ZTqDy

House Democrats are fighting for the testing, tracing & treatment needed to get people back to work safely. But it‚Äôs not enough to just reopen, we must build back better to create a strong economy that is more resilient, more equitable & more just. #ForThePeople

Our nation is rapidly approaching the painful milestone of 200,000 deaths caused by COVID-19. We need a national rescue plan with robust testing, tracing and treatment to protect our communities. America needs the Heroes Act.
https://t.co/0HIcoOM4Gl

More schools are closing every day due to the threat of COVID-19. We need a rescue plan that will deliver critical funds to prevent devastating budget cuts and job losses. We need the Senate to take up our House-passed Heroes Act now and get the job done.

Saratoga Race Course wasn't the same without the fans, a reminder of the many things this pandemic has taken from us. But, as this season comes to a close, it also drives home the many places we are already working to rebuild.

More than 100 days ago, #HouseDemocrats delivered a COVID-19 rescue plan to save our nation called the Heroes Act. It‚Äôs long past time for the Senate do its job and pass legislation that can get the job done for our communities and economy.

Political dismantling of our @USPS hurts millions who depend on it for prescriptions, pandemic supplies, to stay in touch with loved ones, to vote & more! Our House-approved #DeliveringforAmerica Act stops the attacks & restores services. The Senate needs to return and pass it! https://t.co/SrFsbMkGJc

A strong national framework for COVID-19 testing, tracing and treatment has been sitting on Mitch McConnell‚Äôs desk for more than 100 days. Enough is enough. The Senate must stop obstructing our work to rescue our economy & loved ones!

Bottom line: our Postal Service is ESSENTIAL.

We pay bills & fill pantries. That's our economy.

We get medicine. That's our health.

We stay in touch with loved ones. That's our families & communities.

We vote. That's our democracy.

And we do it all safely. That's our @USPS.

@USPS Many of you have relied on @USPS to deliver prescription medicine or other medical supplies e.g. bandages and over-the-counter painkillers. 

Not only have our friends at USPS helped keep our medicine cabinets stocked and first aid kits ready, they've let us stay safe from COVID.

@USPS The second top answer filled my heart. Hundreds of you answered "reach out to loved ones." 

This pandemic has taken so much from us, but our U.S. Postal Service has been there to help us weather this storm, to help us uplift our loved ones and maintain ties to our communities.

Within the first two days we got more than 1,000 responses from constituents. The top answers were especially telling.

More than 1/3 of you paid bills or ordered goods delivered by @USPS. 

In the midst of this pandemic, our U.S. Postal Service is vital for our economy.

#ICYMI: my latest newsletter was on improving our national COVID-19 response.

Now 13 weeks & counting, the Senate must not delay action any longer. Vote now to pass our rescue plan "the Heroes Act" to save our country, millions of jobs & countless lives.
https://t.co/TfILYfveVt

.@USPS is a pillar of our democracy. Keeping it running smoothly during this pandemic can be a matter of life & death for those who depend on it for food, medicine, etc. I'm fighting to stop this Administration's push to dismantle America's postal service!
